sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import Accordion from 'react-bootstrap/Accordion'; import ListGroup from 'react-bootstrap/ListGroup'; import { Button } from 'bootstrap'; import './about.css'; const About = () => { return (

About Me

{/* Who I Am Section */} Who I Am? Hi, I'm Tharushika Navodi, a recent graduate from the Sri Lanka Institute of Information Technology (SLIIT), where I earned my BSc (Hons) in Information Technology with a specialization in Software Engineering. I'm passionate about leveraging my skills in software development, project management, and quality assurance to create impactful software solutions. My journey in the tech world has cultivated a strong interest in crafting efficient code, leading projects, and ensuring the highest standards in software quality. I'm driven by continuous learning and always excited to explore new technologies and challenges. {/* Educational Background Section */} Educational Background
  • Bachelor of Science (Hons) in Information Technology, specializing in Software Engineering
    Sri Lanka Institute of Information Technology (SLIIT)
    Graduated with a Higher Diploma in Information Technology (GPA: 3.2)

  • Assured Diplomas
    • Diploma in Information Technology (DITEC) - ESOFT Metro Campus
    • Diploma in English (DITEC) - ESOFT Metro Campus

  • GCE Advanced Level (A/L) — Physical Science Stream (2019)
    St. Thomas' Girls' High School, Matara
    - Combined Mathematics: B - Chemistry: C - Physics: S

  • GCE Ordinary Level (O/L) (2015)
    Narandeniya National College, Matara
    - Results: 8 A's, 1 C
{/* Professional Experience Section */} Professional Experience I have 6 months of experience as a **Software Project Manager**. I spearheaded the planning for the Aarudhra matrimony project, defining objectives, setting milestones, and creating timelines while collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth project execution. I designed user-friendly web interfaces using Figma and developed full-stack applications with React, Node.js, and MySQL. I managed version control through GitHub and conducted thorough manual testing, writing detailed test cases and test plans to ensure high application performance and reliability. {/* Technical Skills Section */} Technical Skills
Web Development
Java, C++, C, JavaScript, React.js, Node.js, NestJS, Angular, HTML, CSS, Python
Mobile Development
React Native, Android (Java)
Database
MySQL, Firebase, MongoDB
Testing Tools and Frameworks
Postman, Selenium WebDriver, TestNG, Jira, Jenkins, JUnit
Project Management Tools
Jira, Microsoft Project, ClickUp, Miro
Version Control Systems
Git, GitHub {/* Passions & Interests Section */} Passions & Interests I'm deeply passionate about software development, project management, and quality assurance. I thrive on the challenge of creating efficient, reliable software solutions and constantly seek to expand my knowledge and skills in the tech industry. My interests include exploring the latest technology trends, coding innovative projects, and continuously learning to excel in my field. {/* Let's Connect Section */} Let's Connect Phone: +94 762466803 Email: tharushikanavodi28@gmail.com LinkedIn: Tharushika Navodi GitHub: GitHub Profile Medium: Medium Profile
"Believe in continuous learning and strive for excellence in everything you do."
{/* Download CV Button */}
); }; export default About;
